column5: Someone's selling trout Roe in North York  50 bucks for a lb  http://ontario.kijiji.ca/c-buy-and-sell-sporting-goods-exercise-fishing-camping-outdoors-Trout-eggs-W0QQAdIdZ340449564  Appears as if this person lives beside the Humber River
Unless regulations have changed recently, it's legal to sell trout roe in Ontario provided you have a license.

Uh oh!!!  Buying or selling includes "barter or trade"    http://ontariofishin...showtopic=45141        If the mods have any integrity they won't delete this post!!!!  The mods as well as the community know who to call:sarcasm:

Only a registered business can sell it from what I understand and then I believe it has to be bought from a fish farm and not wild caught.  Not only is it illegal but that price is also a rip off. You can buy legal roe for a lot less than that at some local online fishing stores.

No reason to delete this post. Spiel and his friend merely gifted each other some game and there's nothing wrong with that unless there was no beer consumed at the time of the gifting,then  that would be just wrong....
So why not you then? Haven't got the balls?
Wow, you're digging pretty deep here.  Not sure what your motives are, but I'd suggest you get a life.

I think if integrity is to be called into play, then this issue should have been dealt with in a PM between yourself and the individuals called into question. Since you have gone public, so will I. Oh, I also agree with Solo, there is a life to be had, go find one.

I have read and decided to leave it up it seems Glaucus has a issue with our (Mod's) integrity I feel rather their is a problem with his attitude. If he decides to take it to P.M. with the person he feels has "wronged society" then we will reevaluate this thread.   Art
say what what was from the US...I am missing something
Uh oh...  I gave my grandparents walleye at Christmas and the gave me a gift card... Get out the handcuffs...
Musky Mike may have mis-read north york as new york.
It's already being dealt with. but thanks for bringing the scum back to the top of the page.  Good night Mrs. Calabash, wherever you are.
Bring on the ICE, I think some people are getting bored twisting crap.
